comments.body: Could you please ask upstream to add the `LICENSE` file to `MANIFEST.in`?

Sure, as I think you saw it's in the main project tree, but just not included in the manifest. 

This project hasn't been touched since 2010 so I don't know if there will be another release, and don't know if they want to bump the version just for a manifest change. 

The purpose of all of these new conda-forge recipes is to add a complete @psychopy recipe (since that doesn't easily pip install), but I may just close this PR and leave it out of the conda dependency since I believe it pip installs without a problem, and may be cleaner for conda-forge to only have active projects?
If it is unmaintained, there is probably little work that we will need to do.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  home: https://github.com/ioLab/python-ioLabs
  license: BSD-3
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  summary: 'ioLab response box library'
  license_family: BSD
